parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets custom ammo count in the currently loaded magazine of the specified weapon. The unit must be [[local]] to the computer where command is executed. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''setAmmo''' [weapon, count] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - Gunner or vehicle.  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [weapon, count]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Set player's handgun magazine ammo count to 10 rounds:
<code>[[player]] [[setAmmo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[handgunWeapon]] [[player]], 10];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Set player's current weapon magazine ammo count to 1 round:
<code>[[player]] [[setAmmo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[currentWeapon]] [[player]], 1];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> If player is a gunner in a vehicle, set current weapon magazine ammo count to 5 rounds:
<code>[[if]] ([[local]] [[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[then]] {
	[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setAmmo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[currentWeapon]] [[vehicle]] [[player]], 5];
} [[else]] {
	[[hint]] "Vehicle must be local to this machine for 'setAmmo' to work";
};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> If you try to set more ammo than the magazine can hold, it will be clipped at default magazine capacity:
<code>[[player]] [[setAmmo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[primaryWeapon]] [[player]], 1000000]; //full mag with default ammo count
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ammo]], [[setVehicleAmmo]], [[setFuel]], [[setHit]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value> </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
